Who can I ask?

‘Agreeing time for course work in advance with my partner really helped reduce stress’

‘Taking the kids out when he needed to study was the best solution for all of us’

(Partner)

Family might support you in the following ways?

Helping with caring responsibilities

Helping with house work

Helping with decision making

Transport

Tip:

Let your family know in advance the times when you will need to prioritise college commitments (lectures, assignment deadlines, exams etc.)
